com.OODPAssn1.Managers

Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.OODPAssn1.Managers.DataManager
      • com.OODPAssn1.Managers.CourseManager

  • public class CourseManager
extends DataManager
    CourseManager handles every Course object and by extension the list of Index in each Course object.

    CourseManager is a Singleton class and hence to access it you must call the getInstance() function.

      • CourseManager

        private CourseManager()
        Constructor for CourseManager. When CourseManager is first instantiated, it reads the list of courses from the database and stores it in an ArrayList

      • enrolInIndex

        public int enrolInIndex(java.lang.String matricNo,
                        int indexNo)
        Parameters:
        matricNo - Matriculation number of the student who is enrolling into this index
        indexNo - Index Number of the index the student is attempting to enrol into
        Returns:
        returns 0 if an Error occured
        returns -1 if added into waitlist
        returns 1 if successfully enrolled into index
        returns 2 if already enrolled in index
        returns 3 if already in waitlist of the index

      • addLecTimeSlot

        public boolean addLecTimeSlot(Course course,
                              TimeSlot.DAY day,
                              int startH,
                              int startM,
                              int endH,
                              int endM,
                              java.lang.String location)
        Adds a lecture time slot into this Course
        Parameters:
        course - Course to add timeslot into
        day - Day of the lecture
        startH - Start time (hour) (in 24 hours) of this lecture
        startM - Start time (minutes) of this lecture
        endH - End time (hour) (in 24 hours) of this lecture
        endM - End time (minutes) of this lecture
        location - Location of the lecture
        Returns:
        true if lecture is successfully added

        public java.lang.String enrolFirstStudentInWaitlist(int indexNo)
        Enrols the first student in waitlist
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        matriculation number of the student that was enrolled null if not successful

      • dropFromIndex

        public java.lang.String[] dropFromIndex(java.lang.String matricNo,
                                        int indexNo,
                                        boolean bypassWaitlist)
        This function drops a student from the index
        Parameters:
        matricNo - matriculation number of the student to drop
        indexNo - index to drop student from
        bypassWaitlist - true if we do not wish to handle the waitlist
        Returns:
        a string array of size 3.

        first index - SUCCESS, ERROR or HANDLE. HANDLE is an indication to handle the waitlist in UserManager

        second index - contains student's matriculation number to add into index

        third index - contains the index number to add the student matriculation number (specified in second index) to.

      • printAllIndexDetails

        public void printAllIndexDetails()
        Print the details of all the indexes

      • printIndexDetails

        public int printIndexDetails(java.lang.String courseId)
        Prints all index details of a specific course Id
        Parameters:
        courseId - courseId details to print
        Returns:
        1 if successful
        -1 if not successful
